title: Overpass Bannering: Dark Mode
description: Join us for an overpass bannering event to spread a message of love. Bring warm clothing and a good mood to help make good trouble.
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING: DARK MODE

22 DECEMBER 2025
FROM 4:30 TO 6:30
CHEHALIS WESTERN TRAIL / I-5
LACEY

BRING WARM CLOTHING AND
A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!

FIGHT HATE WITH LOVE

MORE INFORMATION:
OLYMPIA INDIVISIBLE, BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG, AND THEBLOP.ORG
raw_summary: The flyer promotes an event organized by the Olympia Visibility Brigade for an overpass bannering activity named "Dark Mode." It is scheduled for December 22, 2025, from 4:30 to 6:30 at the Chehalis Western Trail / I-5 in Lacey. Participants are encouraged to bring warm clothing and a good mood to help spread a message of love. More information is available from Olympia Indivisible, Backbone Campaign, and theblop.org.

title: Corner Protest
description: We are organizing a protest every Tuesday and Thursday to engage positively at the SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins, focusing on protecting democracy and addressing political issues.
meeting_location: SW Corner of Drake and College
raw_text:
Join the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday 3:15-5:15 PM
SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins
Positive engagement

PROTECT DEMOCRACY

Right or Left … we all know this is WRONG!

WE THE PEOPLE

OMG GOP WTF

Tuesday, Dec 23, 2025
3:15 - 5:15 pm
2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
raw_summary: The image describes an ongoing protest event occurring every Tuesday and Thursday. The protest takes place at the SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins, with a focus on engaging participants on current political issues.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade
description: We are organizing an overpass bannering event to stand against threats to democracy. Join us with high-visibility protest signs and flags on the bridge.
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING

27 DECEMBER 2025
FROM 12:00 TO 2:00

BOULEVARD RD SE / I-5
OLYMPIA

OVB

BRING YOUR HIGH-VISIBILITY PROTEST SIGNS, FLAGS, &
A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE
TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!

DEMOCRACY IS
UNDER ATTACK
STAND UP FIGHT BACK!

MORE INFORMATION: OLYMPIA INDIVISIBLE, BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG,
AND THEBLOP.ORG
raw_summary: The image announces the Olympia Visibility Brigade event, which is an overpass bannering demonstration set to take place on December 27, 2025, from 12:00 to 2:00 at Boulevard Rd SE / I-5 in Olympia. Participants are encouraged to bring high-visibility protest signs and flags to join in protest.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade Overpass Bannering: Dark Mode
description: Join us for an overpass bannering event to promote visibility and community action. Bring warm clothing and a good mood to participate in making good trouble.
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE

29 DECEMBER 2025
FROM 4:30 TO 6:30
PEDESTRIAN BRIDGE / I-5
TUMWATER

BRING WARM CLOTHING AND

TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!

MORE INFORMATION: OLYMPIA INDIVISIBLE, BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG, AND THEBLOP.ORG
raw_summary: The flyer is promoting an event called 'Olympia Visibility Brigade Overpass Bannering: Dark Mode' on December 29, 2025, at the Pedestrian Bridge / I-5 in Tumwater. Participants are encouraged to bring warm clothing and join in community action. The event is associated with Olympia Indivisible, Backbone Campaign, and theblop.org.
